mapper.select: SELECT A.C_USER_ACCOUNT, A.C_USER_PASSWORD, A.C_USER_NICK_NAME, A.C_USER_HEAD_IMG, A.D_REGISTER_DATE, A.D_REGISTER_TIME, A.C_STATUS FROM JFM_USER A WHERE A.C_USER_ACCOUNT = #{userAccount} AND A.C_USER_PASSWORD = #{C_USER_PASSWORD}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JFM_USER( C_USER_ACCOUNT, C_USER_PASSWORD, C_USER_NICK_NAME, C_USER_HEAD_IMG, D_REGISTER_DATE, D_REGISTER_TIME, C_STATUS) VALUES ( #{userAccount}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickName}, #{userHeaderImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRegisterDate}, #{userRegisterTime}, #{status} )
